Human.name: Human
Human.description: The basic starter character. Passive: Heal for one at the start of your turn.

Soldier.name: Soldier
Soldier.description: The best offense is a good defense. Passive: Only lose half of your block at the start of your turn instead of all of it.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: The best offense is a good offense, right? Passive: When dropping to or below 10 health for the first time, immediately block for 5.

Wizard.name: Wizard
Wizard.description: "Phenomenal cosmic powers! Itty bitty living space!". Passive: Gain an additional energy at the start of your turn if you have 0.

Ninja.name: Ninja
Ninja.description: Slash your enemies to pieces. Passive: Gain one block after every attack that does damage to the enemies health directly.
